title: The Pale Elf
tags: how to unlock the pale elf
content:
im and attempts to interrupt the ritual he started to ascend in his place, you will be able to decide your involvement when Astarion asks for help.

All right, what do you need? If I help you complete the ritual, it will kill all these people. Didn't you hear him? If I complete the ritual, you'll be consumed. I'm not doing this.

Your actions here will decide the final outcome.

Dialogue Choice 1: Help Astarion Ascend. if you choose to help, you'll need to enter his mind so he can proceed. Dialo
